title: SIFTPointMatchClient
body:
Dear all,

I am trying to get these [pointmatch scripts](https://github.com/AllenInstitute/render-modules/tree/master/rendermodules/pointmatch) to run, but the spark client doesn't like the input.

I have checked the required parameters (`pairJson`,...) and they all exist and/or make sense.

What exactly is the `collection`? Is this generated before? I ran the script to generate the tile pairs, but its output did not contain any collection-related data.

I am calling:

```
software/spark-3.0.0-bin-hadoop3.2/bin/spark-submit --class org.janelia.render.client.spark.SIFTPointMatchClient $SPARK_SCRIPTDIR/target/render-ws-spark-client-2.1.1-SNAPSHOT-standalone.jar --baseDataUrl http://pc-emcf-16.embl.de:8080/render-ws/v1 --owner test --pairJson /g/emcf/schorb/tile_pairs_test1_mipmap_z_21900_to_22300_dist_0.json --SIFTfdSize 8 --SIFTminScale 0.38 --SIFTmaxScale 0.82 --SIFTsteps 3 --matchRod 0.9 --matchMaxEpsilon 20.0 --matchMinInlierRatio 0.0 --matchMinNumInliers 8 --matchMaxNumInliers 200 --maxFeatureCacheGb 1 --renderScale 0.3 --collection test123
```

and the output I get is just:

```
WARNING: An illegal reflective access operation has occurred
WARNING: Illegal reflective access by org.apache.spark.unsafe.Platform (file:/g/emcf/software/spark-3.0.0-bin-hadoop3.2/jars/spark-unsafe_2.12-3.0.0.jar) to constructor java.nio.DirectByteBuffer(long,int)
WARNING: Please consider reporting this to the maintainers of org.apache.spark.unsafe.Platform
WARNING: Use --illegal-access=warn to enable warnings of further illegal reflective access operations
WARNING: All illegal access operations will be denied in a future release
20/10/05 17:13:38 WARN NativeCodeLoader: Unable to load native-hadoop library for your platform... using builtin-java classes where applicable
log4j:WARN No appenders could be found for logger (org.janelia.render.client.ClientRunner).
log4j:WARN Please initialize the log4j system properly.
log4j:WARN See http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/faq.html#noconfig for more info.

Usage: java -cp <render-module>-standalone.jar 
      org.janelia.render.client.spark.SIFTPointMatchClient [options]
  Options:
  * --pairJson
...
```

So something seems to be wrong with the parameters...
